nodes.bodyText: Are these removed again when make clean is used?
now they should be, thanks for pointing that out :)
This file is duplicated 2 times now. Perhaps we should copy it from the html-formatter directory.
It should have been removed with commit 14a6e12, but it did not. Normally that's ok now.
Does this override the clean directive in the included make file or does it extend it?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+include default.mk
+# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2483182/recursive-wildcards-in-gnu-make
+rwildcard=$(foreach d,$(wildcard $(1:=/*)),$(call rwildcard,$d,$2) $(filter $(subst *,%,$2),$d))
+
+SOURCE_FEATURES=$(call rwildcard,../javascript/features,*.feature)
+FEATURES=$(patsubst ../javascript/%,%,$(SOURCE_FEATURES))
+CCK_MESSAGES=$(call rwildcard,../../compatibility-kit/ruby,*.ndjson)
+
+.deps: assets/cucumber-react.css assets/cucumber-html.js assets/index.mustache.html
+
+.tested: acceptance/cck.html
+
+acceptance/cck.html: $(CCK_MESSAGES)
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cat $^ | bundle exec bin/cucumber-html-formatter --format ndjson > $@
+
+acceptance/cucumber.html: .deps $(FEATURES)
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	../../fake-cucumber/javascript/bin/fake-cucumber \
+	  --format ndjson \
+		features/*.feature | \
+		bundle exec bin/cucumber-html-formatter --format ndjson > \
+		$@
+
+features/%.feature: ../javascript/features/%.feature
+	cp $^ $@
+
+assets/cucumber-react.css:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../../react/javascript/dist/src/styles/cucumber-react.css $@
+
+assets/cucumber-html.js:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../javascript/dist/main.js $@
+
+assets/index.mustache.html:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../javascript/dist/src/index.mustache.html $@
+
+
+clean:

nodes.bodyText:
it extends it:
╭─vincent.pretre@Vincents-MacBook-Pro ~/dev/open-source/cucumber/html-formatter/ruby ‹ruby-2.6.3› ‹html-formatter-for-ruby› 
╰─$ make clean
rm -f .deps .linked .tested* Gemfile.lock *.gem
rm -rf acceptance features/all_green.feature features/statuses.feature assets/*.css assets/*.js assets/*.html
First line comes from default.mk, second one from Makefile
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+include default.mk
+# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2483182/recursive-wildcards-in-gnu-make
+rwildcard=$(foreach d,$(wildcard $(1:=/*)),$(call rwildcard,$d,$2) $(filter $(subst *,%,$2),$d))
+
+SOURCE_FEATURES=$(call rwildcard,../javascript/features,*.feature)
+FEATURES=$(patsubst ../javascript/%,%,$(SOURCE_FEATURES))
+CCK_MESSAGES=$(call rwildcard,../../compatibility-kit/ruby,*.ndjson)
+
+.deps: assets/cucumber-react.css assets/cucumber-html.js assets/index.mustache.html
+
+.tested: acceptance/cck.html
+
+acceptance/cck.html: $(CCK_MESSAGES)
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cat $^ | bundle exec bin/cucumber-html-formatter --format ndjson > $@
+
+acceptance/cucumber.html: .deps $(FEATURES)
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	../../fake-cucumber/javascript/bin/fake-cucumber \
+	  --format ndjson \
+		features/*.feature | \
+		bundle exec bin/cucumber-html-formatter --format ndjson > \
+		$@
+
+features/%.feature: ../javascript/features/%.feature
+	cp $^ $@
+
+assets/cucumber-react.css:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../../react/javascript/dist/src/styles/cucumber-react.css $@
+
+assets/cucumber-html.js:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../javascript/dist/main.js $@
+
+assets/index.mustache.html:
+	mkdir -p $(@D)
+	cp ../javascript/dist/src/index.mustache.html $@
+
+
+clean:

nodes.bodyText: Cool. Still a bit hazy on how includes actually work.
nodes.diffHunk:
